issue.title: [Rust] Fix build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12076](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12076). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:


There was a logical conflict between https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/eebf64b00e3a26f61c4bebec7241a0b24d27ec67 which removed the Arc in `ArrayData` and  https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/8dd6abbb72b6b8958f3b2f35512bdadcaf43066f which optimized the compute kernels.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12076?focusedCommentId=17308477) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9796
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9796>
